articles.title: Germany's Friedrich Merz signals seismic shift in Europe-US relations - BBC.com
articles.description: Friedrich Merz heralds a new era for Europe without the US as a key partner, writes Europe editor Katya Adler.
articles.content:
Katya Adler
Germany's chancellor-in-waiting didn'twait for the final results of his country's election on Sunday to herald a new era in Europe. 
Declaring the US indifferent to this continent's fat… [+5439 chars]

articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: Oppo won’t launch the Find N5 in Europe after all - 9to5Google
articles.description: Oppo has confirmed that it will not launch the Find N5 in Europe, undercutting its "global" debut and restricting the device to few regions.
articles.content:
It seems that US users won’t be alone in missing out on Oppo’s latest and greatest foldable, as the company has now confirmed that the Find N5 won’t be launching in Europe.
The Oppo Find N5 launched… [+1503 chars]
